name: MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters
desc: Parameters that affect the process of training an object detection model.

items.name: init(validation: MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ValidationData, batchSize: Int?, maxIterations: Int?)
items.desc: Creates a model parameters instance for an object-detector training session set to use the full network algorithm.

items.name: init(validation: MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ValidationData, batchSize: Int?, maxIterations: Int?, gridSize: CGSize, algorithm: MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType)
items.desc: Creates a model parameters instance for an object-detector training session.

items.name: var validation: MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: The object detector’s validation dataset for the training session.

items.name: var batchSize: Int?
items.desc: The number of images the training session can use in a training iteration.

items.name: var maxIterations: Int?
items.desc: The maximum number of iterations the training session can use.

items.name: var algorithm: MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The algorithm the training session uses to train the object detector.

items.name: var gridSize: CGSize
items.desc: The number of rectangles, vertically and horizontally, the training algorithm uses to analyze each input image.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the model parameters within a playground.

items.name: enum MLObjectDetector.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: A validation dataset for an object detector.
